body.en:
Guided selling re-design

The former Guided Selling QuestionSet, Question, and Answer were redesigned to a separate entity where Question Set became the primary and Question/Answer dependent of it. This was done to separate and scale out the guided selling module.

Users can now go to Administration->Guided Selling to define/maintain the guided selling question set. Each question set has its own new view where all questions and answers can be defined and Omaintained. The answers can also be directly linked to the products. This is in addition to the previously available product tag.

A customer-specific excel upload is also provided which can create a guided selling question set.

 

SSC enhancements for printing language and unit of measure

The general MSP supported following features which were also made available on SSC run configuration engine.:

  1. Print quote proposal in user selected language. This language can be different from session language.
  2. Allow change of the Unit of Measure on a Sales Item.

Internal Price Engine Enhancement – Groovy based pricing step and line item net price calculation:

A new pricing category: Groovy Based is introduced to enable custom coding. Also, the logic to sum up the item net price and value is enabled to be overwritten by groovy script.

Object Locking:

From 1902 release a default database-based locking of object mechanism is supported. The first user-session to edit an object will acquire a lock on the object and any other user-sessions update request will be rejected. The lock is only released upon object save, cancel or session logout/timeout.

 

DA Profile to hide da/da values re-design:

From 1902 release MSP also supports hide of DA (Dynamic Attribute) and its values using DA Profile. This is more powerful in sense any quote data point can be used to hide the values and this can be defined in the lookup table.

Attach Proposal to quote:

From 1902 release MSP also supports attaching the generated proposal back to the quote itself. This is controlled by the user selecting the option “Save Proposal as Attachment”. MSP would then attach the quote proposal to itself as well.

1. Other enhancements:

Some other enhancements in the sales process were also done, these include:

  1. Support rejection of quote, in the quote status open.
  2. On object copy, copy of its default folder structure.
  3. Groovy enable the mark proposal sent for custom programming.
  4. Allow user to select a country region/state based on the selected country.
  5. Use country region in ERP Pricing.

 

2. Tool Support

2.1 UI customization

A very strong feature is developed that helps admin users to select which ui components to hide/disable for which user profile. 

 

2.2 Excel-based modeling environment/data entry – a simple case

Another sheet was added that allows the user to define conditional triggers without the need to write search expression. User can directly use the DA name to define the conditions. 

 

2.3 Audit Query Service performance change

The former design of collecting audit data was causing performance slowness and an increase in usage of database CP usage. To correct this a new design was put in place and tested to eradicate the problem.

 

2.4 Other features and bugfixes

  1. Bug fixes and cleanups.
  2. Clean up on the ability to delete a greater number of items.

body.en:
Documentation

We are newly launching our Documentation to help you learn about what material and find what you need from our document. By viewing anywhere and anytime on your own time own target through your computer and your device.

To view our newly launch document. Click on Get Started get more information.
